mapper.select: select sum(money) from tb_trade where to_days(create_time) = to_days(now()) and seller_open_id = #{openId} and trade_type=0
select sum(money) from tb_trade where seller_open_id = #{openId} and trade_type=0

select p.title as productTitle,t.buyer_open_id as buyerOpenId,t.seller_open_id as sellerOpenId,t.trade_type as tradeType,t.money,t.create_time as createTime from tb_trade t left join tb_product p on t.product_id=p.id where buyer_open_id = #{openId} or seller_open_id=#{openId}
SELECT t.money,t.create_time AS createTime, p.title as productTitle FROM tb_trade t LEFT JOIN tb_product p ON t.product_id = p.id WHERE buyer_open_id =#{openId} GROUP BY product_id

SELECT t.money,t.create_time AS createTime, p.title as productTitle ,count(t.product_id) as sellerCount FROM tb_trade t LEFT JOIN tb_product p ON t.product_id = p.id WHERE seller_open_id =#{openId} GROUP BY product_id;
